description: Document and improve use of various disconnects
Add particle effects when cutting down a tree
Move SDL functions and types to a namespace
Throw exceptions where appropriate on SDL-function failures
Sort _materials and _craftableItems by name, not ID
Allow terrain types to be marked as non-blending
Optimize container types for faster iteration
Change dynamic_casts that don't check their result to static_cast or check for nullptr
Use forward declarations where possible, to reduce unnecessary #includes
Add grass objects, which grow naturally on grass tiles
Make trees drop branches over time
Allow a recipe to create multiple item types
Use set::count() and map::count() to test set membership
Move appropriate configuration details into config file
Choose gather item based on gathers left, not nominal quantity
Prevent gathering/deconstructing when object has an inventory
Allow giving away or begging for goods via trade
Fix ambiguity of Object::removeItem() and Object::removeItems()
isLocationValid() only checks one point against one terrain tile/chunk
Move client colors to config file instead of hardcoding
Players can move through small objects
Only save map data once, on generation
Empty objects reported as not empty when attempting to dismantle
Use namespaces for server and client
Deal constant damage every 1s when close to target
Allow aggressive and normal targeting on right/left click
Memoize texture for other users' names
Make client-side NPCs a subclass of ClientObject
Avoid multiple data loads for custom server data
Blood particles for attacking and death, that remain for a time
Add homesteading and tile property rights
Find mechanics to encourage town construction
